response.overview: Motivated by a tragic school shooting in Nashville, Tennessee, Ketch Secor, of the popular bluegrass band Old Crow Medicine Show, and radio journalist David Greene (host of public radio’s “Left, Right, and Center") set out to have an open conversation about gun violence in America. The result is a music documentary which humanizes all sides of today’s gun debate: rural, urban, gun-owners and non, and shows how respect and listening can help move the needle on gun reform in ways our polarized culture rarely displays.
response.title: Louder Than Guns
